body.p: In September 2019 the Board amended IFRS 9, IAS 39 and IFRS 7 by issuing Interest Rate Benchmark Reform, which confirmed with modifications the proposals in the 2019 Exposure Draft. In the amendments issued in September 2019, the Board added paragraphs 102A–102N and 108G to IAS 39.
